data.title: Birthday surprise
data.text: Perfect dinner for sons birthday.   Everything was great and atmosphere.   Did not feel like a chain which was nice.   Great food

data.title: Wonderful new addition to Sioux Falls
data.text: We found this place by accident during the Sidewalk Arts festival, enjoyed it very much and have recently returned for another go at it. I believe we will come back again and again when we are in town and need a meal. It's such a fun atmosphere, the service is fast and friendly and the food is so tasty. It's really hard to make a menu decision, but we've had the rangoon flatbread and the goat cheese queso twice--so yummy!! Can't wait to try something different next time.

data.title: Service consistently awful
data.text: I've been here several times since it opened and one thing is consistent: the service is terrible. Food is good, but slow. Don't expect a drink within 30 minutes of being here. If you want the food get take out and wait until it's ready. Don't bother sitting in.

owner_response.author: Marissa K, Manager at MacKenzie River Pizza, Grill & Pub, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are extremely sorry to hear that your service has been sub-par in your times with us. We take these things very seriously. We would like to hear more about what went wrong with your visit and what we can do to ensure you have an excellent time not only with food quality but with all elements of your experience with us. Please feel free to reach out to me anytime. Siouxfalls@mackpie.com
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Atmosphere - Really good food!
data.text: One of the best in Sioux Falls! Great Pizza, Great burgers, Couple really good pasta dishes, Best Happy Hour food! Some really great staff too. Remember to tip well they make like $4 an hour in SD.

owner_response.author: Marissa K, Manager at MacKenzie River Pizza, Grill & Pub, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We love that you had such a great time with us! Thank you for not only saying such nice things but also for looking our for our staff, we all very much appreciate it. Can not wait to have you in again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Well worth the wait.
data.text: Great salads, entrees & pizza.  This is quite a popular downtown spot and we have always had a wait-but it is worth it.

owner_response.author: Marissa K, Manager at MacKenzie River Pizza, Grill & Pub, responded to this review
owner_response.text: So wonderful to hear your experience was great! We know there can be a bit of a wait but with our "table is ready" text service you can come in, put your name in and enjoy our bar or the wonderful downtown Sioux Falls has to offer. We look forward to seeing you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food, drinks and atmosphere
data.text: Great food and environment.  It's downtown which can be difficult to find parking.  Reservations are helpful, especially on the weekends.  Staff is friendly and accommodating.

owner_response.author: Marissa K, Manager at MacKenzie River Pizza, Grill & Pub, responded to this review
owner_response.text: So glad to hear from you and even happier that you enjoyed your time with us. We know DT can be a pain with parking but the lots just to the east and north of us have free parking after 6pm and are only a short walk away. We look forward to seeing you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: PIZZA!
data.text: Love this place.  Downtown Sioux Falls.  Service has been so-so, but as long as you get us a beer ASAP, we don't care.  The first time we ordered the "Rancher" pizza after seeing it on another's table.  It was DELISH!!!  The second time, waited a while for a table, but didn't mind.  Was planning on ordering something different because the stuff we saw coming out for tables all looked amazing and good portions, but we enjoyed the Rancher pizza so much, we ordered it again and were not disappointed.  We are here 3 months for work and have friends coming in a week to visit from Florida and will likely bring them here!

owner_response.author: Marissa K, Manager at MacKenzie River Pizza, Grill & Pub, responded to this review
owner_response.text: So great to hear that you enjoyed our pizza! We have been working hard to up that server rating from so-so to excellent. The Rancher is definitely a great choice, we lokk forward to seeing you again and again while you are in SF!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fish and chips
data.text: Order the fish and chips. Great French fries and the fish is real fish. Fish and chips fish and chips!

owner_response.author: Marissa K, Manager at MacKenzie River Pizza, Grill & Pub, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so glad to hear you enjoyed our Fish and Chips! We look forwards to seeing you soon and continuing to server you the freshest and tastiest Fish and Chips SF has to offer!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Will be back
data.text: We almost didn't go because we envisioned mainly a "pizza" joint. It's not. Great bar atmosphere and great menu. It's also family friendly for dinner. Although I heard the pizza is amazing we chose other options and it was very good. This will be our downtown destination for dinner and drinks next time we are in Sioux Falls.

data.title: Nice experience
data.text: Ended up here with my wife for dinner and a couple beers.  This was my 2nd time in here.  The first time I had a mediocre-bad experience (everything from service to the food was bad, that was months ago though).  Last night was a good experience.  The server we had last night was very friendly, very fast, and very helpful.  I had a pizza, my wife had a sandwich.  I personally think their pizza is relatively mediocre, but it's not bad and it's relatively inexpensive.  The beer selection is pretty good here.  It's super nice inside and in a good location.  We'll likely be back.

data.title: What a charming surprise
data.text: Great place - not just a pizza place but they have many other choices. They also have very unique pizza choices if you are adventurous. Service was pretty good. Front of the property is a little louder than in the back. A good choice in Sioux Falls

data.title: Decent Food...Terrible Service
data.text: We recently tried out Mackenzie River for my sister-in-law's birthday dinner. Things started out fine, but my wife never received a drink that she ordered. No big deal so we just reminded our waiter. After about 30 minutes there was still no drink or the appetizer we ordered. The guy finally brings a sample glass of my wife's drink after 45 minutes. Not the full pint she ordered....just a 2oz sample. We then question about our food orders to find out that one order wasn't even prepared and would take even more time to make. It was meatloaf so I'm not sure how a restaurant can't prep that for dinner service. Finally after an hour or so we got our original appetizer 5 minutes before our orders came out...minus the meatloaf. As we all were half finished with our meals the meatloaf order finally came, and a manager brought us an additional appetizer as an apology. As if we wanted to eat another appetizer as we finished our meals that already took forever. Our waiter was at our table at least 6-7 times explaining the delays and never once refilled our drinks. Just as I was about to throw the empty glass and break it to get some attention he finally took our refill request. I set the timer on my phone and 11.5 minutes later we got our waters. Of course taking our empty glasses was too much work so there we sat with several empty plates and glasses for the remainder of our miserable time. I realize there can be some delays when places are busy but this place wasn't full by any means and it was early dinner service. The food was pretty good, but not 2 hour wait good with everything else that got screwed up. It may have been a fluke but we won't be going back. First impression was lasting!

user_location.name: Sioux Falls, South Dakota, United States

data.title: Sunday Dinner
data.text: Most places in downtown Sioux Falls are closed on Sunday night. So opted for MacKenzie's for Eddie's post-marathon meal. We started with pretzel bread accompanied by a chile cheese dip. It was good but a bit greasy. I didn't realize they deep fry it. Then I had a wedge salad and Eddie had a turkey burger - both good choices. We had asked the server if they could put one of the tvs on the US Open. He said they would buy it never happened.  So the food ended up good but nothing special, same with the service.

data.title: Jumped the Curb
data.text: Stopping in Sioux Falls late afternoon on our way to the Badlands. Looking for a place to eat dinner after being on the road 9.5 hours. Headed downtown to another restaurant and saw MacKenzie River Pizza, Grill & Pub as we were driving by. Just curb appeal made us divert! Great menu and adult beverage choices! Hard to choose! We had the black bean burger and it was very tasty! Great service and attention by our server, Katie as well as, the hostess interaction made us feel quite at home! Try it!

data.title: Yum!
data.text: What a great food experience!  Great food, excellent service and absolutely love the decor.  I had a scrumptious burger.  Excellent is all I can say.

data.title: Worth the stop for sure
data.text: We really didn't even know about this place, and although from out of town we get to Sioux Falls a couple times a month for sure. Rode the trolley the last day of the year, Labor Day, and the driver pointed this place out as her favorite spot to eat. We were really pleased with the service, and even more so the food. Good portions that are priced right. It was not very loud when we visited but not full either. This is one of those gems that is tucked off the main roads in town, but we will be back for sure. Kids loved the cheeseburger kids meal and so nice to have lettuce or fruit options for them instead of the usual garbage served everywhere else. The Rancher pizza was great!

data.title: Awesome atmosphere!
data.text: This is a great sports bar/casual dining place to eat.  Many food and drink options.  When you sit at the bar there is an ice island that you set your drink on so it always stays cold.  Was told there was a 45 minute wait so we asked to sit at the bar - that was also full so we were told we could just watch for spots to open up and grab them.  In the meantime they had also put our name down on the wait list - when spots opened up we just told them to remove our name off the wait list - pretty well organized.  Food was great and wait staff were excellent!  Highly recommend and will definitely go back!

data.title: Great food + patio!
data.text:
The food is pretty great here. I had a wrap and enjoyed it. Waffle fries are also good. Husband said beer choices are great. Loved the dessert choices. The pizza looked great, so I need to try that next visit. 

I wanted to give it a perfect rating, but the waitress never came back to get us more drinks. I'm not sure if she was just too busy or not.

LOVE the patio! Will return in the future

owner_response.author: Marissa K, General Manager at MacKenzie River Pizza, Grill & Pub, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Sounds like you were able to try a few of our great menu items, that's awesome! I'm sorry that the server didn't get back around to you for more drinks, nothing worse than an empty glass. The weather is changing quickly, you've got a few more good weeks to get out on that patio! Come on down!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A quality downtown bar/restaurant w/ fun atmosphere, good food and great service.
data.text: Found a parking place on Main Street and went in here when passing by and seeing folks having a great time in the open air seating portion of the restaurant.  A good choice of bar/beer drinks, good menu and quick service.  TV's for watching all the sports and a lively atmosphere make this a good place to stop for a meal.  My wife and I both had pizza's...she had the "Good ol boy" and I had the "Stockman", both very good w/ thin crust, plenty of tomato sauce and served hot at a reasonable price.

owner_response.author: Marissa K, General Manager at MacKenzie River Pizza, Grill & Pub, responded to this review
owner_response.text: The stockman is a great pie, glad you tried it, also happy that you found convenient parking. For the football season this year we have the NFL package as well as the BIG 10, so come on down we hope to see you soon! So glad you guys enjoyed your visit with us.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Dining in road trip heaven
data.text: While on one of our longer Geocaching Road Trips from Oklahoma recently we surfed looking for Bison and came up this tasty place near our route. This was so good, I wanted to stay longer for more, but we were on a time schedule trying to get up and over into Minnesota. I had a Jalapeno Margarita and that was super hot and super good. It didn't end as badly as I was thinking later either. My team and I had a wonderful stop here and will again should fate bring us back.

owner_response.author: Marissa K, General Manager at MacKenzie River Pizza, Grill & Pub, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Geocaching! How fun! Everyone at MacKenzie is so happy you enjoyed your visit with us and we really hope that you make it back through soon! Good luck in Minnesota!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
